description: Does Isaiah 40:1-11 Answer to Isaiah 6? Spectrality and Autonomy in Deutero-Isaiah Claudia V. Camp, Texas Christian University “All This is the Book of the Covenant of the Most High God”: Orality, Literacy and Textual Authority in the Work of Ben Sira Rollin Ramsaran, Emmanuel School of Religion From Mind to Message: Oral Performance In 1 Corinthians 15 Whitney Shiner, George Mason University Sounding The Eschatological Alarm: Chapter Thirteen In The Performance Of Mark
title: Does Isaiah 40:1-11 Answer to Isaiah 6? Spectrality and Autonomy in Deutero-Isaiah
